titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 33: Job 2:4-3:26; Job 7:8-8:21

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: In prose segment (chapter II) columns are internally consecutive; in the poetic segment each verse is split between the columns. Fol. 1 contains Job II 4 יתן בעד - III 26 שלותי ולא; in missing part of fol. were III 4-7 and the latter phrases of III 24, to end of chapter; fol. 2 contains ibid., VII 8 לא תשורני - VIII 22 ר]שע]ים]; in missing part of fol. were VII 20-VIII 7 and approximately IX 1-11; only text break signified graphically follows III 1.
Black ink ruling method: writing accommodates uneven cut of parchment columns

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library). Cairo Genizah Collection (Dropsie College. Library). Sulzberger.
